enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: CONTINUING REVIEW OF THE FUNCTIONS AND OPERATIONS OF THE SECRETARIAT
sentences: Harald Dovland reported on the informal consultations on workshop funding and promoting a geographical balance in the Secretariats senior staff.
Chair Stoycheva introduced the draft conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2004/L.14), which Parties adopted without amendment.
